name: Cards of Knight
description: Cards of Knight mixing Cards and Platformer together to provide a new game experience. Build a deck, Grow up the knight, Challenge different levels and Discover more cards and treasure here!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
